name: Matchtea
tag_list: matchtea, sports, facility, database, online, uk, venues, find
overview:
Matchtea is a UK based online sports facility database accessible to anyone looking to find and book UK sports facilities in their area.

They are currently focusing on London tennis courts and are in the process of rolling out an online booking system geared specifically towards tennis courts.

This booking system is completely free to use and can be switched on in minutes. Sports facilities can take bookings the conventional way (e.g. via telephone/in-person) at no cost. Matchtea make their money by taking a small commission on any bookings made specifically through their marketplace.

They are currently in beta and are piloting in the London area with their first booking system set to launch at the end of November 2012.
